name: .KCXZ File Extension
summary: Learn about .KCXZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: No known program can restore KCXZ files to their original state. The best way to recover your files is to retrieve them from a recent backup or perform a System Restore to a point before your computer was infected.
